newsitem.title: USA: Telco Comm in paging/messaging svcs pact.
newsitem.headline: Telco Comm in paging/messaging svcs pact.

text.p: Telco Communications Group Inc said on Tuesday it had signed an agreement with Destineer Corp under which Telco will provide SkyTel enhanced messaging and paging services to its "Prime Business" customers.
SkyTel is a brand of Mobile Telecommunications Technologies Corp, the parent of Destineer Corp.

Under the 12-month agreement, Telco will provide customers of its Commercial Sales Division - which provides telecommunications products and services to commercial and carrier customers and which markets its "Prime Business" service line - with toll-free access to the SkyTel network covering the continental United States, Alaska and Hawaii.
Customers will have access to a full range of enhanced messaging services, including text and numeric paging, and SkyTel's 2-Way messaging system, Telco said.
